title: Intro to C Programming
details_course: Learn the basics of C programming. Suitable for beginners. No prior experience required.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details_course: Explore fundamental algorithms and their analysis. Essential for aspiring programmers.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details_course: Utilize C++ for Data Structures and Algorithms. Learn classes, templates, and STL.

title: Basic Data Structures
details_course: Master fundamental data structures: arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
details_course: Learn OOP concepts using Python. Classes, inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation.

title: Software Engineering
details_course: Cover development methodologies, design patterns, testing, and project management.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details_course: Introduction to cloud computing with a focus on AWS services like EC2 and S3.

title: Database (MySQL)
details_course: Learn MySQL for relational database management. Design, query, and administer databases.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details_course: Advanced problem-solving techniques for competitive programming and technical interviews.
